short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check out our new way to share feelings using GIFs with sound! Klipy makes it super easy to find:

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Clips (GIFs with sound), GIFs, and funny pictures from movies, TV shows, or cool videos.
- Make and change your favorite clips.
- Keep the ones you like in your own collections.
- Get likes and views to be a top creator.
- Follow other users and see their stuff.

For the best experience, get our app from the Play Store or the App Store. Find out about KLIPY's privacy practices here: https://klipy.co/documentation/privacy 

Need help? Email us at support@klipy.co.
